documentation.text:
@notice Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.
 @param _pid The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
@notice Safe Poolify transfer function, just in case if rounding error causes pool to not have enough PLFYs.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit LP tokens to Poolify Reward manager for PLFY allocation.

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

pendingPoolify(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending PLFY on frontend.

setPoolifyPerBlock(uint256).notice: set the number of PLFY per block

stakeTokens(uint256).notice: Address of the ERC-20 for each Pool.

userInfo(uint256,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes tokens.
